comment: Smart data models - Damper schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/Damper/schema.json
description: A damper typically participates in an HVAC duct distribution system and is used to control or modulate the flow of air.

contents.name: airFlowRateMax
contents.comment: Property. Maximum allowable air flow rate. Usually measured in m3/s.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bladeAction
contents.comment: Property. Blade action.

contents.name: bladeEdge
contents.comment: Property. Blade edge.

contents.name: bladeShape
contents.comment: Property. Blade shape. Flat means triple V-groove.

contents.name: bladeThickness
contents.comment: Property. The thickness of the damper blade. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: closeOffRating
contents.comment: Property. Close off rating. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: faceArea
contents.comment: Property. Face area open to the airstream. Usually measured in square metre (m2).

contents.name: frameDepth
contents.comment: Property. The length (or depth) of the damper frame. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: frameThickness
contents.comment: Property. The thickness of the damper frame material. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: frameType
contents.comment: Property. The type of frame used by the damper (e.g., Standard, Single Flange, Single Reversed Flange, Double Flange, etc.).

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: leakageFullyClosed
contents.comment: Property. Leakage when fully closed. Usually measured in m3/s.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalAirFlowRate
contents.comment: Property. Nominal rate of air flow. Usually measured in m3/s.

contents.name: numberOfBlades
contents.comment: Property. Number of blades.

contents.name: openPressureDrop
contents.comment: Property. Total pressure drop across damper. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).

contents.name: operation
contents.comment: Property. The operational mechanism for the damper operation.

contents.name: operationTemperatureMax
contents.comment: Property. Allowable operation ambient (air, fluid) temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: operationTemperatureMin
contents.comment: Property. Allowable operation ambient (air, fluid) temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: orientation
contents.comment: Property. The intended orientation for the damper as specified by the manufacturer.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: temperatureRating
contents.comment: Property. Temperature rating. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: workingPressureMax
contents.comment: Property. Maximum working pressure. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
